name: Cannon Target
description:
Cannon Target - A simple puzzle game, the only goal of the player is to choose the firing direction of the cannon and hit the target.

Of course, the game will not directly put the target in front of the cannon and press launch to hit the target. There are many things such as changing the direction of the cannonball, obstacles, portals, etc. that will affect the player hitting the target. It depends on the players' minds to analyze how to hit the target.

The game currently has 50 levels to play, some levels have more than one way to pass, and players can play more times.

The following are shortcut keys:
Press the "Esc" key in the game to return to the selection page
Press the "F" key in the game to fire the shell
Press the "R" key to re-level in the game
